group.name: BruSsels FuNky FreNch: imPROVe with theater & musical imPROV

description:
Will 2014 be your year to get your French in shape? Then this is the best moment to get the rust and dust off your langue de Molière. Time for BruSsels FuNky FreNch!


L'Apéro de Bienvenue, the Kick-off Drink, is the perfect occasion to meet fellow FuNky FreNchies.
And also to hear about planned workshops and events:  Funny theater improv games, funky musical improvisation: 100% In French!


Join this exciting Meetup group and become a Funky Frenchie aujourd'hui.
For the first 50 to join there is a nice surprise..
name: Let's Meetup for an Apéro de Bienvenue

group.name: BruSsels FuNky FreNch: imPROVe with theater & musical imPROV

description:
C'est parti…!! The BruSsels FuNky FreNch kick-off drink last Tuesday was a night full of fun, French and fantastic energy. Let's do more of that. We can use the great workshop space Au Quai for at least 3 Tuesdays per month!

This is your chance to really get your French in shape before summer comes :-) Fitness for your French & for your brain, through funny theater improv games, funky musical improvisation: 100% in French.

* No theater or singing experience needed.
* Your French needs to be at a decent beginners level or more. * Participation of 15€ per workshop, or 55€ for a forfait of 5 times. This includes drinks & materials.

Now tell your friends, and share the fun.

Give them a chance too to get their French into the fast lane.

See you next Tuesday!
name: ImPROVe your French, at the 1st FuNky FreNch ImPROV Night (full 2,5 hr workshop)

group.name: BruSsels FuNky FreNch: imPROVe with theater & musical imPROV

description:
Chers FreNchies,

Ce mardi 17 juin c'est le dernier FuNky FreNch de la saison, où une de nos membres très enthousiaste, Annette, ne pourra pas être présente. Alors elle nous propose que ce vendredi 20 juin on fasse une soirée finale de cet été chez elle au jardin, avec piano, style auberge espagnole. 


S'il fait chaud ce sera bien sympa!

Adresse: Appelez[masked] pour l'adresse, et pour lui communiquer ce que vous apportez (à boire ou à manger)


tram 19 à Elisabeth ( Simonis) direction Groot Bijgaarden
arrêt hôpital Valida
name: Soirée festive d'été

group.name: BruSsels FuNky FreNch: imPROVe with theater & musical imPROV

description:
Salut les FreNchies! The start of a new active year: isn't that the perfect moment to get your French in shape? Alors.. come and join us, to get the rust & dust off your langue de Molière. Time for BruSsels FuNky FreNch!

L'Apéro de Bienvenue (Kick-off Drink) is a great occasion to meet fellow FuNky FreNchies. A free opening evening, full of fun & FreNch. And: un verre de vin is awaiting you:-)

The perfect moment to hear about planned workshops and get a taste of them: Funny theater improv games, funky musical improvisation: 100% In French!

Join this fuNky Meetup group, and RSVP for the Apéro aujourd'hui.
For the first 5 to RSVP there is a nice surprise..
name: Free Apéro de Bienvenue

group.name: BruSsels FuNky FreNch: imPROVe with theater & musical imPROV

description:
A new work year started;
time to imPROVe your French, in a fun and fast way.

FuNky FreNch season has a great start again, thanks to all of you.
Now, let's imPROVe further!
Time for the third series: FuNky FreNch 3.0 :-) 

Toujours au menu:
Funny games & funky music, 100% in French.
Fitness for your French & for your brain! 

Remember:
* No theater or singing experience needed.
* Your French needs to be at a decent beginners level or more.
* Participation of 15€ per workshop, or 50€ for a forfait of 5 times. It will be 60€ for all the 6 of them. This includes drinks & materials. 

NB: tell your friends, and share the fun.
Give them a chance too to get their French in shape.
See you Tuesday October 7 !

           BruSsels FuNky FreNch:
       Friends - Fun - FreNch (et du vin :-)
